snippet: Iconic guitars, Kerouac’s original manuscript for “On the Road,” and a signed Warhol soup can — all artifacts collected by Indianapolis Colts owner Jim Irsay — are on display at the Indiana State Museum.
abstract: Iconic guitars, Kerouac’s original manuscript for “On the Road,” and a signed Warhol soup can — all artifacts collected by Indianapolis Colts owner Jim Irsay — are on display at the Indiana State Museum.

headline.main: Everything Indy: Jim Irsay's Museum Pieces
